item.title: Inventor of confocal microscope develops new giant lens
item.author: James Clegg,
item.description: Brad Amos, who contributed significantly to the development of the laser scanning confocal microscope while working at the Medical Research Council in Cambridge, has developed a new giant microscope, the ‘Mesolens’, that allows the imaging of an entire mouse embryo in subcellular detail.
